title: The 3rd Istanbul International Water Forum from 27th to 29th May, 2014
decision_details: -  a delegation led by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage attended the above Conference. The Conference had focused on subjects of water security and legal aspects of water and was attended by Water Professionals, Academia, Scientists, International Organizations etc.  The delegates had agreed to common approaches to water and sanitation issues and Millennium Development Goal Targets in the Asian Region.  The above information was furnished to the Cabinet by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage.
